name: Keisya Djenar Dinda Lestari
description: third-year student of Applied Electronics Engineering Technology at Politeknik Negeri Semarang, with a strong interest in industrial electronics, automation systems, and embedded systems. Possesses solid foundational skills in circuit assembly, microcontroller programming, and system analysis. Eager to gain real-world experience through internship or part-time opportunities to further enhance technical skills and contribute effectively in a dynamic work environment. Aspiring electrical engineer looking to leverage academic background in electronic engineering technology and practical skills in software and hardware development to gain industry experience and advance my career in electronics and automation.
